Beyond Dance Studio is the first of its kind in Ethiopia offering a wide range of kids dance, martial arts and instrumental classes from Ballet, Jazz, Taekwondo, Piano and Beyond. Ourvision is to introduce the joy of dance to hundreds of children across Addis Ababa. We grow our students to become confident, creative and courageous individuals who make lasting memories along the way.
